PointerType Class Reference

#include <PointerType.h>

Inheritance diagram for PointerType:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A pointer type defines the image and the hotspot of a pointer.

Examples for pointer types are the select pointer and the horizontal resize pointer. Pointer types are defined by the skin.

See also:
Skin

virtual void onPointerMoved (  Vector  newPosition,
Vector  oldPosition
)  [virtual]
 

Handles the event that the pointer has moved, e.g.

by creating an effect. The default implementation does nothing.

Parameters:
newPosition The new position of the pointer.
oldPosition The old position of the pointer.
